Articles.Content: Hi! My name is damburgah and I'm a new member of the forum. I've been playing the game for a few solid months and becoming increasingly engrossed. I like math and computers and riding my bike and hanging out with friends. I've been fond of this community for some time but never actively participated until now. Anyway, hope to see ya'll around. Thanks, I love you.

Welcome to the forums! Glad to hear you've decided to take the plunge and get active in the community. Feel free to ask questions (or help other people with theirs), share your favorite stories and screenshots, or just generally make yourself at home.
Awesome, thank you! Lovely forums here. I can't wait to get started.
